summary: This document appears to be an internal list of positions held by members of a committee at Deutsche Bank, detailing their roles and associated legal entities. It includes various titles and names of individuals, primarily focusing on their positions within the organization.

persons.name: Steven Eked
persons.context: Steven Eked is listed as the Chairperson and Chief Risk Officer for the Americas.

persons.name: Stuart Clarke
persons.context: Stuart Clarke is identified as the Vice-chairperson and Chief Operating Officer for the Americas.

persons.name: Steven Reich
persons.context: Steven Reich is mentioned as the General Counsel for the Americas.

persons.name: Francis Kelly
persons.role: Head of Government and Public Affairs
persons.context: Francis Kelly is listed as the Head of Government and Public Affairs for the Americas.

persons.name: Eric Smith
persons.context: Eric Smith is identified as the Chief Financial Officer for the Americas.

persons.name: Jan Ford
persons.context: Jan Ford is mentioned as the Regional Head of Compliance for the Americas.

persons.name: Rich Weber
persons.context: Rich Weber is identified as the Head of Anti-Financial Crime for the Americas.

persons.name: Stephen Doka
persons.context: Stephen Doka is mentioned as the Regional Head of Investigation.

keyFacts: The document lists various positions held by individuals at Deutsche Bank, including their titles and roles.
It includes both voting and non-voting members of a committee.
The document is marked as confidential and intended for internal use only.
